text: aur jab chha jaatee hai unapar lahar chhatron ke samaan, to pukaarane lagate hain allaah ko, usake lie shudhd karake dharm ko aur jab unhen surakshit pahuncha deta hai thal tak, to unamen se kuchh santulit rahane vaale hote hain aur hamaaree nishaaniyon ko pratyek vachanabhangee, ati krtaghn hee nakaarate hain
